title: 3 and Out - XXL Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - XXL Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
John dedicates the entire pod to answering listener questions in a deluxe sized Middlekauff Mailbag on a variety of football and non-football topics! Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
